findings.title: Token scarcity issues require manual review
findings.description: Check for conditions such as no user owning most of the supply, sufficient total supply, tokens located in multiple exchanges, users understanding associated risks, and token not allowing flash minting.

findings.title: Unclear authorization specification for adding tokens
findings.description: The addToken function allows anyone to list a new token on Hermez, contradicting the online documentation which implies that only governance should have this authorization.

findings.title: Flash minting can lead to substantial swings in the balance and the total supply
